Heartbleed
Team 50s 3307 Group Project. A platformer game where you, the user, is spawned in as a computer bug with the goal of infiltrating and infecting the computer system. Navigate through the terrain, avoid/defeat enemies, enjoy a beautiful soundtrack and attempt to conquer the final boss.

src Directory Reference

Files

 Boss.cpp
 Implements the Boss enemy, a special variant with custom attacks and behavior.
 
 Bullet.cpp
 Implements the behavior and rendering of projectile bullets in the game.
 
 Collider.cpp
 Defines Colliders.
 
 Enemy.cpp
 Defines the behavior and properties of enemy characters.
 
 Player.cpp
 Implements the Player class, which handles movement, physics, input, shooting, and collisions.
 
 Stage.cpp
 Implements the Stage class, which loads level data including tiles and enemies from a JSON file.
 
 Tile.cpp
 Implements the Tile class which represents a rectangular game object with collision and texture.
 
 UI.cpp
 Implements the UI class, which loads and manages UI elements using tiles and textures.
